meeting_request.purpose: Help with improving my academic performance in Philosophy
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Carrie, a third-year Philosophy student. I’ve taken a lot of difficult and abstract courses lately, and I’m feeling frustrated. Some of my grades are still low, and I’m not sure if I should keep going or if I’ve reached a plateau. I’ve also been involved in some Philosophy-related clubs and events, and I’m trying to connect with the community, but I feel like I’m still not fully engaged. I’m interested in exploring my career options after undergraduate study, but I don’t know where to start or what to do. I want to talk to someone who can help me feel more confident, make progress, and figure out what's possible.
